name: superpowers-game-threejs-plugin
description: Expose Three.js to the Typescript API of the Superpowers Game system for Superpowers, the extensible HTML5 2D+3D game engine.
author: Florent Poujol <florent.poujol@gmail.com> (http://florentpoujol.fr)

scripts.install: echo The THREE.js plugin depends on the DOM plugin to work. You can get it from https://github.com/florentpoujol/superpowers-game-dom-plugin or via `npm install superpowers-game-dom-plugin`
